==Features==
==Features==
â
*Ability to customize [[GNOME]], [[KDE3]], [[KDE4]], [[XFCE4]], [[LXDE]], [[IceWM]], [[WindowMaker]], [[Fluxbox]], [[TWM]], and [[Enlightenment (window manager)|Enlightenment]] [[Desktop environment|desktop environments]] / [[X window manager]] via a Chrooted [[Xephyr]] window introduced in version 2.9
  â
*Ability to customize the Boot image, Boot Progress Splash ([[usplash]]), wallpaper, Gnome Splash Screen, [[GNOME Display Manager|GDM]] theme, and other settings<ref>[http://reconstructor.aperantis.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&id=29&Itemid=39 reconstructor - What Can It Do?]</ref>
 
*Ability to add software to the new compilation <ref name=autogenerated1>[http://reconstructor.aperantis.com/gallery/ Reconstructor 2.5]</ref>
*Ability to add software to the new compilation <ref name=autogenerated1>[http://reconstructor.aperantis.com/gallery/ Reconstructor 2.5]</ref>
*Ability to enable all the [[software repository|repositories]] and add custom ones <ref name=autogenerated1 />
*Ability to enable all the [[software repository|repositories]] and add custom ones <ref name=autogenerated1 />
â
*Integrated option to burn the iso <ref name=autogenerated1 />
  â
*Ability to use graphical programs inside the [[chroot]] (experimental in version 2.8.1)<ref>http://reconstructor.aperantis.com/index.php?option=com_joomlaboard&Itemid=44&func=view&id=1054&catid=3</ref>
